Package de.yamass.redg.generator.extractor

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
de.yamass.redg.generator.extractor.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object

A class that provided useful methods for connecting to a extractor, executing SQL scripts and analyzing the extractor.

The normal workflow would be to connect to the extractor, execute a few scripts and then run the analysis. 

 Connection conn = DatabaseManager.connectToDatabase(...);
 DatabaseManager.executePreparationScripts(conn, scripts);
 Database db = DatabaseManager.crawlDatabase(conn, schemaRule, tableRule);

  • Method Details

    • executePreparationScripts

      public static void executePreparationScripts(DataSource dataSource, File[] sqlScripts) throws IOException, SQLException
      Executes the SQL scripts specified in the sqlScripts parameter. The SQL gets split into statements and gets executed via the connection by a ScriptRunner. The output from the script runner simply gets discarded.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - The data source providing a JDBC connection to use for script execution
      sqlScripts - The array containing all sql files that should be executed
      Throws:
      IOException - Gets thrown when a file IO fails
      SQLException - Gets thrown when the a part of the SQL could not be executed

    • crawlDatabase

      public static schemacrawler.schema.Catalog crawlDatabase(DataSource dataSource, schemacrawler.inclusionrule.InclusionRule schemaRule, schemacrawler.inclusionrule.InclusionRule tableRule) throws schemacrawler.schemacrawler.exceptions.SchemaCrawlerException
      Starts the schema crawler and lets it crawl the given JDBC connection.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - Provides the JDBC connection
      schemaRule - The InclusionRule to be passed to SchemaCrawler that specifies which schemas should be analyzed
      tableRule - The InclusionRule to be passed to SchemaCrawler that specifies which tables should be analyzed. If a table is included by the tableRule but excluded by the schemaRule it will not be analyzed.
      Returns:
      The populated Catalog object containing the metadata for the extractor
      Throws:
      schemacrawler.schemacrawler.exceptions.SchemaCrawlerException - Gets thrown when the database could not be crawled successfully
